Package com.ibm.mqttsample.midpapp

This package contains a J2ME MIDP-1.0 sample application.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Echo Echo is a sample MQ Telemetry Transport application that can run in the J2ME MIDP environment.
The MIDlet will only work in a MIDP 1.0 environment if TCP/IP sockets are supported.
WmqttGauge This extends Gauge to make a gauge that can continuously scroll.
WmqttMgr This class customises the MQTT Java Client API for use by the Echo application.
 

Package com.ibm.mqttsample.midpapp Description

This package contains a J2ME MIDP-1.0 sample application. The MIDlet subscribes to a particular topic to receive data. Any data received is displayed on the devices UI and published (echoed) back to the broker on another topic.
There are three classes in this package.

  • Echo.java - This implements the application logic
  • WmqttGauge.java - This extends Gauge to make it continuously scroll
  • WmqttMgr.java - This customises the WMQTT API for the Echo application
